alert.note: Alert for Kit Carson County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 7:31AM MDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Kit Carson and northwestern Sherman Counties through 800 AM MDT... At 731 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Kanorado, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Kanorado around 740 AM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Ruleton. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 0 and 13. Interstate 70 in Colorado between mile markers 449 and 450. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
